explanation_of_categorization: All files represent routine operational maintenance
reason_for_change: Continuous improvement, operational maintenance, and security enhancement

plan_and_timeline_for_change.timeline_status: No notification required for this SCN type

copy_of_business_or_security_impact_anal.security_risk_assessment: Low - Standard, low-risk maintenance with mature processes

changed_files_detailed.diff:
diff --git a/.github/workflows/run-vdr-script.yml b/.github/workflows/run-vdr-script.yml
index fe05350..4cabec9 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/run-vdr-script.yml
+++ b/.github/workflows/run-vdr-script.yml
@@ -10,6 +10,9 @@ jobs:
     steps:
       - name: Check out code
         uses: actions/checkout@v4
+        with:
+          token: ${{ secrets.ACTION_PUSH_TOKEN }}  # Added: Use same token as other workflows
+          fetch-depth: 0
 
       - name: Set up Python
         uses: actions/setup-python@v5
@@ -18,26 +21,23 @@ jobs:
           
       # STEP 1: Run the backend script from the repo root
       - name: Run VDR Production Alignment Script (Backend)
-        # REMOVED: working-directory key. The default is correct.
         run: python3 rfc-0012/vdr-production-alignment.py
 
       # STEP 2: Run the dashboard script from the repo root
       - name: Run VDR Dashboard Alignment Script (Frontend)
-        # REMOVED: working-directory key. The default is correct.
         run: python3 rfc-0012/vdr_dashboard_aligner.py
 
       # STEP 3: Run the pipeline update script from the repo root
       - name: Run VDR Pipeline Configuration Update
-        # REMOVED: working-directory key. The default is correct.
         run: |
           chmod +x rfc-0012/update_pipeline_vdr.sh
           rfc-0012/update_pipeline_vdr.sh
       
-      # STEP 4: Commit all changes
+      # STEP 4: Commit all changes with proper authentication
       - name: Commit and push changes
         run: |
           git config --global user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
           git config --global user.email "actions@github.com"
           git add .
           git commit -m "chore: Apply VDR alignment to backend, frontend, and pipeline" || echo "No changes to commit"
-          git push
+          git push  # Will use the ACTION_PUSH_TOKEN from checkout

audit_trail.decision_logic: Official FRA-SCN-03 Decision Tree with Contextual Diff Analysis
